name: Night Hunters (thisisaac)
description:
One of my projects for Honours Project at UCLan (University of Central Lancashire) set in a high fantasy world.

Creatures of the night have launched an attack on town. It is your task as an Inquisitor to purge these creatures from the town, even if you must use your vampiric lineage to do so.
